name: Spaera
description: SPAERA is a head-to-head puzzle fighting game, using an unique match-3 cascading mechanic as its core system. The world of SPAERA is heavily inspired by characters, gameplay and themes from games that we loved to play as we were growing up.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, or 10 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E7300 Memory: 3 GB RAM Graphics: Intel Integrated HD 4000 Sound Card: DirectX compatible soundcard or onboard chipset
